INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>1</b>', '<b>Format and Presentation of the Balance Sheet</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.54 IAS 1.57', '1.1', '<b><u>As a minimum</u></b>, does the statement of financial position include line items that present: <ol type=\"a\"> <li>Property, plant and equipment;</li> <li>Investment property;</li> <li>Intangible assets;</li> <li>Financial assets (excluding amounts shown under e., h, and i);</li> <li>Investments accounted for using the equity method;</li> <li>Biological assets;</li> <li>Inventories;</li> <li>Trade and other receivables;</li> <li>Cash and cash equivalents;</li> <li>The total of assets classified as held for sale and assets included in disposal groups classified as held for resale in accordance with IFRS 5;</li> <li>Trade and other payables;</li> <li>Provisions;</li> <li>Financial liabilities (excluding amounts shown under k. and l.)</li> <li>Liabilities and assets for current tax;</li> <li>Deferred tax liabilities and assets;</li> <li>Liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5;</li> <li>Issued capital and reserves attributable to owners of the parent.</li> </ol> <p>NB1: The Standard does not prescribe either the format or the order in which these items are presented.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.55, 58,59', '1.2', 'Where necessary to give a true and fair view, have additional line items, headings and subtotals been included in the Statement of Financial Position?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.60 IAS 1.56 IAS 1.67', '1.3', '(Unless a liquidity based or ‘mixed’ basis presentation is more relevant) an entity shall present the following as separate elements of the Statement of Financial Positions: <ul> <li>Current Assets;</li> <li>Non-Current Assets;</li> <li>Current Liabilities; and</li> <li>Non-Current Liabilities.</li> </ul> <p>NB1: All deferred tax balance must be classified as non-current.</p> <p>NB2: Different terminology can be used for the above classifications.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.61 IAS 1.64.65', '1.4', 'Irrespective of how the Statement of Financial Position is presented, has the entity disclosed the amount expected to be recovered or settled after more than 12 months for each asset and liability line item that combines amounts expected to be recovered or settled: <ul> <li>No more than twelve months after the reporting period; and </li> <li>More than twelve months after the reporting period?</li> </ul> <p>Specific IFRS require extensive maturity disclosure regarding financial instruments (and thus there is some overlap in the requirements of the Standards), however, IAS 1.61 requires maturity analysis about all classifications, thus for example, provisions and stock would need the above analysis.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.77', '1.5', '<p>An entity shall disclose, either on the face of the Statement of Financial Position or in the notes a suitable sub-classification of the line items presented in the Statement of Financial Position (i.e. a split of receivables into: trade, related party, prepayment and other).</p>\r\n<p>IAS 1 gives examples only, and some specific Standards prescribe a minimum level of analysis (these issues have been specifically noted later in the checklist), however, management of the entity must consider whether the level of analysis is detailed enough to be meaningful.</p>\r\n<p>Has an adequate level of analysis been given for Statement of Financial Position items?</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>2</b>', '<b>Non-Current Assets classified as Held for Resale and the Assets of a Disposal Group</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 5.38', '2.1', 'Have non-current assets classified as held for sale and the assets of disposal groups classified as held for sale been disclosed separately?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 5.38', '2.2', 'Have the liabilities of disposal groups been disclosed separately within liabilities?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 5.38', '2.3', 'Have the major classes of assets or liabilities classified as held for sale been separately disclosed either in the Statement of Financial Position or the notes?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 5.41(a)', '2.4', 'Is there a description of the non-current assets (or disposal group)?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 5.41(b)', '2.5', 'Is there a description of the facts and circumstances of the sale, or leading to the expected disposal, and the expected manner and timing of that disposal?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 5.42', '2.6', 'Where a non-current asset (or disposal group) ceases to be treated as such have the following been disclosed:- <ul> <li>A description of the facts and circumstances leading to the decision; and </li> <li>The effect of the decision on the results of operations for the period and any prior periods presented?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>3</b>', '<b>Approval and Signature</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 10.17', '3.1', 'Is the date on which the financial statements are to be authorised for issue by the board of directors disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 10.17', '3.2', 'Where applicable has it been disclosed that under legislation, on a voluntary basis, the directors can amend these financial statements if they subsequently prove to be defective?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('Best Practice', '3.3', 'Are the names of the directors signing on behalf of the board stated?\r\n<p><i>If there is only one director, only one signature is needed.</i></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>4</b>', '<b>Intangible Assets (Including Goodwill)</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.119 IAS 38.125', '4.1', 'Are intangible assets suitably analysed, IAS 38 gives the following examples, which could be aggregated or disaggregated to make the information more meaningful: <ul> <li>Brand names;</li> <li>Mastheads and publishing titles;</li> <li>Computer software;</li> <li>Licences and franchises;</li> <li>Copyrights, patents and other industrial property rights, service and operating rights;</li> <li>Recipes, formulae, models, designs and prototypes; and</li> <li>Intangible assets under development?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('Voluntary Disclosure', '4.2', 'Entities are encouraged to disclose the following information by IAS 38.128: <ul> <li>A description of any fully amortised intangible assets that are still in use; and</li> <li>A brief description of significant intangible assets controlled by the entity but not recognised because they did not meet the recognition criteria in IAS 38 or because they were acquired or generated before the version of IAS 38 issued in 1998 was effective?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.124 (a)', '4.3', 'Where intangible fixed assets are revalued have the following disclosures been given by class of asset: <ul> <li>The effective date of the revaluation;</li> <li>The carry value of the intangible assets;</li> <li>The carrying value that would have been recognised had the assets been carried under the historic cost model?</li> </ul> <p>NB: It is illegal to revalue goodwill and other intangibles can rarely be revalued.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.118 (c), (e) ', '4.4', 'Is the following reconciliation note disclosed for each class of intangible fixed assets noted above and distinguishing between internally generated intangibles and other intangibles? <ul> <li>Aggregate cost / valuation at the beginning and end of the financial period;</li> <li>Additions, indicating separately those from internal development and those actually acquired;</li> <li>Acquisitions through businesses combinations;</li> <li>Assets now classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5;</li> <li>Other disposals;</li> <li>Increases and decreases in revaluation;</li> <li>Net exchange difference arising on the translation of the financial statement into the presentation currency, and on translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the entity;</li> <li>Other changes;</li> <li>Aggregate cumulative amortisation / impairment losses at the beginning and end of the period;</li> <li>Amortisation;</li> <li>Impairment losses recognised in the profit or loss;</li> <li>Impairment losses reversed in the profit or loss;</li> <li>Any adjustments as a result of disposals in the period;</li> <li>Assets now classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5; </li> <li>Other disposals;</li> <li>Net exchange differences arising on the translation of the financial statements into the presentation currency, and on translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the entity;</li> <li>Other changes;</li> <li>Net carrying amount at the beginning and end of the period?</li> </ul> <p>NB: Full corresponding amounts <b><u>need</u></b> to be disclosed.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.122 (b) ', '4.5', 'Where an <b><u>individual</u></b> intangible fixed asset is material, have the following been disclosed: <ul> <li>A description of the asset;</li> <li>The carrying value;</li> <li>The remaining amortisation period?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.122 (e) ', '4.6', 'Have any contractual commitments for the acquisition of intangible assets been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.122 (d)', '4.7', 'Where any intangible assets have restricted title or have been pledged as security for a liability, has this been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.122 (c )', '4.8', 'Where intangible assets have been acquired by way of a grant and have been recognised at fair value in accordance with IAS 38.44, have the following been disclosed: <ul> <li>The fair value initially recognised for these assets;</li> <li>The carrying value of these asset; and </li> <li>Whether they are measured after recognition under the cost model or the revaluation model?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.122 (a), IAS 38.123 ', '4.9', 'Where an intangible asset is deemed to have an indefinite useful economic life, have the following been disclosed:- <ul> <li>Its carrying value; and</li> <li>The reasons supporting the assessment of an indefinite useful life (IAS 38.90 gives examples)?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>5</b>', '<b>Property Plant and Equipment (PPE)</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.77(a) IAS 16.36 ', '5.1', 'Is PPE suitably classified? <p>The following examples are given in IAS 16:</p> <ul> <li>Land;</li> <li>Land and buildings;</li> <li>Machinery;</li> <li>Ships;</li> <li>Aircraft;</li> <li>Motor vehicles;</li> <li>Furniture and fixtures; and </li> <li>Office equipment.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.74 (a)', '5.2', 'Has the existence and carrying amounts of PPE to which the entity has restricted title, or that is pledged as security for a liability been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.74 (b)', '5.3', 'Has the amount of expenditure recognised in the carrying amount of an items of PPE in the course of construction been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.79', '5.4', 'Where useful to the user of the financial statements, have the following disclosures been given:- <ul> <li>The carrying amount of temporarily idle items of PPE;</li> <li>The gross carrying amount of any fully depreciated items of PPE that are still in use;</li> <li>The carrying value of items of PPE retired from active use and not classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5; and </li> <li>When the cost model is used, the fair value of PPE when this is materially different from the carrying amount?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.73 IAS 40.76(f)', '5.5', 'Is the following reconciliation note disclosed for each class of PPE: <ul> <li>Aggregate cost / valuation at the beginning and end of the financial period;</li> <li>Additions;</li> <li>Acquisitions through businesses combinations;</li> <li>Assets classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group as classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5 or other disposals;</li> <li>Foreign exchange movements;</li> <li>Revaluations;</li> <li>Other changes.</li> <li>Aggregate cumulative depreciation / impairment losses at the beginning and end of the period;</li> <li>Depreciation;</li> <li>Revaluations;</li> <li>Impairment losses recognised in profit or loss;</li> <li>Impairment losses reversed in profit or loss;</li> <li>Any adjustments as a result of assets being classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group as classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5 or other disposals;</li> <li>Foreign exchange movements;</li> <li>Other changes.</li> <li>Net carrying amount at the beginning and end of the period?</li> </ul> <p>NB1: Full corresponding amounts need to be disclosed.</p> <p>NB2: Transfers to and from investment properties will also need to be disclosed.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.77 (a) (b) (d) ', '5.6', 'Where items of PPE have been revalued, have the following disclosures been given in addition to the disclosures required by IFRS 13: <ul> <li>The effective date of the revaluation;</li> <li>Whether an independent valuer was involved;</li> <li>For each classification of PPE, the carrying value that would have been recognised if a cost model had been adopted?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>6</b>', '<b>Right of Use Assets and Assets Used in Operating Leases</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '6.1', 'IFRS 16 Leases disclosure requirements are collated into questions 13 to 16 below.', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>7</b>', '<b>Investment Properties</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS.40 75 (e) ', '7.1', '<p>Has the extent to which the fair value of investment properties is based on a valuation by an independent, qualified valuer, with recent experience in the location and class of asset been disclosed?</p>\r\n<p>Alternatively, where no such valuation has been undertaken has this fact been disclosed?</p>\r\n<p>NB: This disclosure would also apply where valuations are disclosed rather than accounted for.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.75 (g)', '7.2', 'Where there are restrictions on the realisability of investment properties or the remittance of income and proceeds of disposal has this been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.84C& 84E', '7.3', 'For accounting periods beginning <b><u>on or after 1 January 2018,</u></b> review paragraphs 57 and 58 of IAS 40 in relation to transfers of investment properties. These have been amended by <i>Transfers of Investment Property (Amendments to IAS 40).</i>\r\n<p>If, in accordance with paragraph 84C, an entity reclassifies property at the date of initial application of the Amendments, has the entity disclosed the amounts reclassified to, or from, investment property in accordance with paragraph 84C?</p>\r\n<i>The entity shall disclose those amounts reclassified as part of the reconciliation of the carrying amount of investment property at the beginning and end of the period as required by paragraphs 76 and 79.</i>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.76 IAS 40.78', '<b>7.4</b>', '<b>Investment Properties ~ Where the Fair Value Model has been Adopted</b> <p>Is the following information disclosed:</p> <ul> <li>Carrying value at the beginning and end of the financial period;</li> <li>Aggregate additions (showing separately additions arising from acquisitions, subsequent expenditure or as a result of a business combinations);</li> <li>Assets re-classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5 and other disposals;</li> <li>Net gains and losses from fair value adjustments;</li> <li>Net exchange differences;</li> <li>Transfers to and from inventories and owner-occupied properties (PPE); and</li> <li>Other changes?</li> </ul> <p>NB: Full corresponding amounts <b><u>need</u></b> to be disclosed.</p> <p>NB: Where in <b><u>exceptional circumstances</u></b> some assets are held at cost, then the above analysis would need to be given for assets held at fair value and assets held at cost.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.77', '7.5', 'Where a valuation obtained for an investment property is adjusted significantly before being incorporated into the financial statements (e.g. to avoid the double-counting of assets that are recognised as separate assets) is there a reconciliation between the two figures, showing separately the aggregated amount of any recognised lease obligations that have been added back?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.78 (a) to (d)', '7.6', 'In exceptional circumstances, where the entity has adopted the fair value model, however certain investment properties are carried at cost as their fair value cannot be established, have the following disclosures been given:- <ul> <li>A description of the investment property;</li> <li>An explanation of why fair value cannot be reliably measures;</li> <li>(If possible) The range of estimates within which fair value is highly likely to lie; and</li> <li>On disposal: <ul> <li>The fact that the entity has disposed of an investment property not carried at fair value;</li> <li>The carrying value at the time of sale; and</li> <li>The amount of gain or loss recognised?</li> </ul> </li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.80', '7.7', 'Where an entity capitalises a property interest held under an operating lease for the first time, then it is encouraged but not required to undertake a PYA <b><u>if the fair value of the property has been disclosed in the prior year financial statements</u></b> (this is a different treatment than that which is normally required by IAS 8), however, if in the above circumstances a PYA is not undertaken, has this fact been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.79 (c) to (d)', '7.8', '<b>Investment Properties ~ Where the Cost Model has been Adopted</b> <p>Is the following reconciliation disclosed:</p> <ul> <li>Aggregate cost at the beginning and end of the financial period;</li> <li>Aggregate additions (showing separately additions arising from acquisition, subsequent expenditure or as a result of a business combinations);</li> <li>Assets classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group as classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5 or other disposals;</li> <li>Transfers to and from inventories and owner-occupied properties (PPE);</li> <li>Foreign exchange movements;</li> <li>Other changes.</li> <li>Aggregate cumulative depreciation / impairment losses at the beginning and end of the period;</li> <li>Depreciation;</li> <li>Impairment losses recognised in the profit or loss;</li> <li>Impairment losses or reversed in the profit or loss;</li> <li>Any adjustments as a result of assets being classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group as classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5 or other disposals;</li> <li>Transfers to and from inventories and owner-occupied properties (PPE) due to change of usage;</li> <li>Foreign exchange movements;</li> <li>Other changes;</li> <li>Net carrying amount at the beginning and end of the period?</li> </ul> <p>NB: Full corresponding amounts <b><u>need</u></b> to be disclosed.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.79 (e) (i) to (iii) ', '7.9', 'Where it is not possible to <b><u>disclose</u></b> the fair of investment properties carried at cost, are the following disclosures given: <ul> <li>A description of the investment property;</li> <li>An explanation of why fair value cannot be reliably measures;</li> <li>(If possible) The range of estimates within which fair value is highly likely to lie?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>8</b>', '<b>Investments in Associates and Joint Ventures (Where Consolidated Financial Statements are Not Being Prepared)</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 27.17', '8.1', 'For each significant investment in a joint venture or associate are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>Name;</li> <li>The principal place of business (and country of incorporation, if different);</li> <li>The holding company’s proportion of the ownership interest (and its proportion of the voting rights, if different) held in those investees?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>9</b>', '<b>Inventories</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 2.36 (b) IAS 1.78 (c) IAS 2.37', '9.1', '<p>Has the total carrying value of inventories been disclosed, have inventories been appropriately classified and a carrying value disclosed for each classification?</p> <p>NB: The key issue is that the classification of inventories must be appropriate to the entity. IAS 2 notes that the following are common classifications:</p> <ul> <li>Merchandise;</li> <li>Product supplies;</li> <li>Materials;</li> <li>Work in progress; and</li> <li>Finished goods.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 2.36\r\n(c )', '9.2', 'Has the carrying value of inventories carried at fair value less cost to sell been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 2.36\r\n(h)\r\n', '9.3', 'Where stock has been pledged as security for liability, has the total carrying value of such items been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>10</b>', '<b>Receivables</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.78 (b)', '10.1', 'Are receivables analysed as follows: <ul> <li>Amounts receivable from trade customers;</li> <li>Receivable from related parties;</li> <li>Prepayments; and</li> <li>Other amounts?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS\r\n15.\r\n105', '10.2', 'When either party to a contract has performed, has the contract been presented in the statement of financial position as a contract asset or a contract liability, depending on the relationship between the entity’s performance and the customer’s payment? ', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 15. 105', '10.3', 'Has the entity disclosed any unconditional rights to consideration as a receivable? ', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 15. 109', '10.4', '<p>IFRS 15 uses the terms ‘contract asset’ and ‘contract liability’ but does not prohibit an entity from using alternative descriptions in the statement of financial position for those items. </p>\r\n<p>If an entity uses an alternative description for a contract asset, has sufficient information been provided for a user of the financial statements to distinguish between receivables and contract assets?</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11</b>', '<b>Deferred Tax Assets</b>\r\n<p>There are additional disclosures regarding deferred tax assets, however, to avoid duplication these have been in included in the ‘Provisions’ section of this checklist.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>12</b>', '<b>Cash and Cash Equivalents </b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('Best\r\nPractice', '12.1', 'Where client money has been derecognised, is the total amount disclosed, and has the accounting policy adopted by the entity been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '', '<b>IFRS 16 Leases</b> <p>IFRS 16 Leases is mandatory for accounting periods commencing on/after 1 January 2019. The disclosure requirements are more substantial than those previously required by IAS 17. </p> <p>The disclosures required under IFRS 16 have been listed below in this section, rather than split between the SCI, Statement of Financial Position and Accounting Policies sections of the Checklist. It is considered that, in the circumstances of the significant additional disclosures required, it is more straightforward to provide the disclosure requirements in one section.</p> <p>The disclosure requirements have been broken down as follows :</p> <ul> <li>13 – Entity is a lessee</li> <li>14 – Entity is lessor: finance leases</li> <li>15 – Entity is a lessor: operating leases</li> </ul> <p><b>First time adoption of IFRS 16 will also require additional transitional disclosures; see question 5.2 of Section 8 – </b>“Accounting Policies and Estimation Techniques” <b>below. This will require completion of a supplementary checklist.</b> </p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>13</b>', '<b>Entity is a Lessee</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.52', '13.1', 'A lessee shall disclose information about its leases for which it is a lessee in a single note or separate section in its financial statements. Has a separate note been presented which includes all of the appropriate information, including that detailed in the questions below? \r\n<p><i>NB: A lessee need not duplicate information that is already presented elsewhere in the financial statements, provided that the information is incorporated by cross-reference in the single note or separate section about leases.</i></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.53', '13.2', 'Has disclosure been given of the following amounts <b>relating to profit or loss and other comprehensive income</b>, in tabular format (unless another format is more appropriate): <ul> <li>depreciation charge for right-of-use assets by class of underlying asset (*);</li> <li>interest expense on lease liabilities;</li> <li>the expense relating to short-term leases where the recognition exemption (per paragraph 6 of IFRS 16) has been applied (NB: This expense need not include the expense relating to leases with a lease term of one month or less);</li> <li>the expense relating to leases of low-value assets where the recognition exemption (per paragraph 6 of IFRS 16) has been applied (NB: This expense shall not include the expense relating to short-term leases of low-value assets included in paragraph (c) above);</li> <li>the expense relating to variable lease payments not included in the measurement of lease liabilities;</li> <li>income from subleasing right-of-use assets (*); and</li> <li>gains or losses arising from sale and leaseback transactions?</li> </ul> <p><b>NB: if the right of use asset meets the definition of investment property, the disclosures marked (*) are not required to be given.</b></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.53', '13.3', 'Has disclosure been given of the following amounts <b>relating to the statement of cash flows</b>: <ul> <li>the total cash outflow for leases?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.53 IFRS 16.47 IFRS 16.48', '13.4', 'Has disclosure been given of the following amounts <b>relating to the statement of financial position</b>: <ul> <li>Additions to right of use assets (*);</li> <li>The carrying amount of right of use assets at the end of the reporting period, analysed by class of underlying asset (*); and</li> <li>If the right of use assets are not shown separately in the statement of financial position, disclosure of which line items in the statement of financial position include the right of use assets?</li> </ul> <p><b>NB: if the right of use assets meet the definition of investment property, these should be presented as investment property and the disclosure requirements of IAS 40 should be applied. The disclosures marked (*) above are not required to be given in this instance.</b></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.47', '13.5', 'Has disclosure been given of the following amounts <b>relating to the statement of financial position</b>: <ul> <li>The lease liabilities; and</li> <li>If the lease liabilities are not shown separately in the statement of financial position, disclosure of which line items in the statement of financial position include the lease liabilities?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.58', '13.6', '<p>Has the entity provided a maturity analysis of lease liabilities, disclosed separately from the maturity of other financial liabilities? </p>\r\n<p><b><i>NB: IFRS 16 does not mandate the time bands for the maturity analysis; instead, reference is made to IFRS 7 which suggests the entity uses judgement to determine an appropriate number of time bands.</i></b></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.60', '13.7', '<p>If the entity has taken advantage of the exemption to not apply the IFRS 16 recognition principles to short-term leases, has it disclosed that fact? </p>\r\n<p><b><i>NB: a short-term lease is a lease with a term of 12 months or less from the commencement date.</i></b></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.55', '13.8', 'If the portfolio of short-term leases to which the entity is committed at the end of the reporting period is dissimilar to the portfolio of short-term leases to which the current short-term-leases expense relates, is there disclosure of the lease commitments for short-term leases for which the exemption referred to above has been applied? ', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.60', '13.9', 'If the entity has taken advantage of the exemption to not apply the IFRS 16 recognition principles to leases of low-value assets, has it disclosed that fact?\r\n<p><b><i>NB: the “low value” criteria is an absolute criteria, based on the underlying asset having a value, when new, of US$5,000 or less. Materiality does not come into the equation.</i></b></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.59', '13.10', 'Where necessary to meet the objective of providing users of the financial statements with sufficient information to assess the effect that leases have on the financial position, financial performance and cash flows of the lessee, has additional qualitative and quantitative information been disclosed? <p>This may include the following: </p> <ul> <li>the nature of the lessee’s leasing activities;</li> <li>future cash outflows to which the lessee is potentially exposed that are not reflected in the measurement of lease liabilities. This includes exposure arising from: <ul> <li>variable lease payments;</li> <li>extension options and termination options;</li> <li>residual value guarantees; and</li> <li>leases not yet commenced to which the lessee is committed.</li> </ul> </li> <li>restrictions or covenants imposed by leases; and</li> <li>sale and leaseback transactions.</li> </ul> <p><b>Additional guidance is available in IFRS 16 B48 to B52</b></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>14</b>', '<b>Entity is a Lessor: Finance Leases</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS16.9016.91', '14.1', 'Has disclosure been given of the following, in tabular format (unless another format is more appropriate): <ul> <li>selling profit or loss;</li> <li>finance income on the net investment in the lease; and</li> <li>income relating to variable lease payments not included in the measurement of the net investment in the lease?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS16.93', '14.2', 'Has a qualitative and quantitative explanation of the significant changes in the carrying amount of the net investment in finance leases been given? ', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS16.94', '14.3', 'Is there a maturity analysis of lease payments receivable, which shows the undiscounted lease payments to be received on an annual basis for a minimum of each of the first five years and a total of the amounts for the remaining years?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS16.94', '14.4', 'Has a reconciliation between the undiscounted lease payments and the net investment in the lease been given?\r\n<p><i>NB: this reconciliation shall identify the unearned finance income relating to the lease payments receivable and any discounted unguaranteed residual value.</i></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>15</b>', '<b>Entity is a Lessor: Operating Leases</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS16.90', '15.1', 'Is there disclosure of lease income, analysed as follows: <ul> <li>Income relating to variable lease payments that do not depend on an index or a rate; and</li> <li>Other lease income?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS16.97', '15.2', 'Is there a maturity analysis of lease payments receivable, which shows the undiscounted lease payments to be received on an annual basis for a minimum of each of the first five years and a total of the amounts for the remaining years?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS16.95', '15.3', 'For items of property, plant and equipment subject to an operating lease, the disclosure requirements of IAS 16 shall be applied. \r\n<p>In applying the disclosure requirements in IAS 16, have the disclosures been provided separately for assets subject to an operating lease (by class of underlying asset) from those owned assets held and used by the lessor?</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS16.96', '15.4', 'Where applicable, have the disclosure requirements of IAS 36 <i>Impairment of Assets</i>, IAS 38 <i>Intangible Assets</i>, IAS 40 <i>Investment Property</i> or IAS 41 <i>Agriculture</i> been complied with?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>16</b>', '<b>Entity is a Lessor: Additional disclosures relevant to both finance and operating leases</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS16.92', '16.1', 'Where necessary to meet the objective of providing users of the financial statements with sufficient information to assess the effect that leases have on the financial position, financial performance and cash flows of the lessor, has additional qualitative and quantitative information been disclosed? <p>This may include the following: </p> <ul> <li>the nature of the lessor’s leasing activities; and</li> <li>how the lessor manages the risk associated with any rights it retains in underlying assets. In particular, a lessor shall disclose its risk management strategy for the rights it retains in underlying assets, including any means by which the lessor reduces that risk.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>17</b>', '<b>Creditors Regarding a Dividend in Specie</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRIC 16', '17.1', 'Has the following been disclosed: <ul> <li>the carrying amount of the dividend payable at the beginning and end of the period; and</li> <li>the increase or decrease in the carrying amount recognised in the period in accordance with IFRIC 17, paragraph 13 as result of a change in the fair value of the assets to be distributed?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>18</b>', '<b>Service Concession Arrangements</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('SIC 29 6, 7', '18.1', 'All aspects of a service concession arrangement shall be considered in determining the appropriate disclosures in the notes. <p>An operator and a grantor shall disclose the following in each period: </p> <ul> <li>a description of the arrangement;</li> <li>significant terms of the arrangement that may affect the amount, timing and certainty of future cash flows (e.g. the period of the concession, re-pricing dates and the basis upon which re-pricing or re-negotiation is determined);</li> <li>the nature and extent (e.g. quantity, time period or amount as appropriate) of: <ul> <li>rights to use specified assets;</li> <li>obligations to provide, or rights to expect, provision of services;</li> <li>obligations to acquire or build items of property, plant and equipment;</li> <li>obligations to deliver or rights to receive specified assets at the end of the concession period;</li> <li>renewal and termination options; and</li> <li>other rights and obligations (e.g. major overhauls);</li> </ul> </li> <li>changes in the arrangement occurring during the period; and</li> <li>how the service arrangement has been classified?</li> </ul> <p>NB: These disclosures need to be provided individually for each service concession arrangement, or in aggregate for each class of service concession arrangements.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>19</b>', '<b>Service Concession Arrangements</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('SIC 29.6A', '19.1', 'If the entity is an operator, has it disclosed the amount of revenue and profits or losses recognised in the period on exchanging construction services for a financial asset or an intangible asset?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>20</b>', '<b>Provisions for Liabilities</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.78(d)', '20.1', 'Are Provisions analysed as follows: <ul> <li>Provisions for employee benefits</li> <li>Other items.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.85 (a) to (e) ', '20.2', 'For each class of provision are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>The carrying amount at the beginning and end of the period;</li> <li>Additional provisions made in the period, including increases to existing provisions;</li> <li>Amounts used (i.e. incurred and charged against the provision) during the period;</li> <li>Unused amounts reversed during the period; and</li> <li>The increase during the period in the discounted amount arising from the passage of time and the effective change in the discount rate?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.85 (a) to (c) ', '20.3', 'Is the following disclosed for each class of provision: <ul> <li>A brief description of the nature of the obligation;</li> <li>The expected amount and timing of any resulting payments;</li> <li>An indication of uncertainties about the amount or timing of those outflows; </li> <li>(Where necessary to provide adequate information) the major assumptions made concerning future events; and</li> <li>The amount of any expected reimbursements, stating the amount of any asset that has been recognised for that expected reimbursement?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.92', '20.4', 'The disclosure requirements of 20.3 do not have to be complied with if deemed to be seriously prejudicial (unless required by statute, which some of them are): <p>If advantage is taken of this exemption, are the following disclosed:</p> <ul> <li>the general nature of the dispute; </li> <li>the fact that full disclosure has not been given, and</li> <li>the reason why the required information has not been given?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>21</b>', '<b>Deferred Tax (Liabilities and Assets)</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 12 82', '21.1', 'Has the amount of any deferred tax asset been disclosed together with the nature of the evidence to supporting its recognition, when: <ul> <li>The utilization of the deferred tax assets is dependent on future taxable profits in excess of the profits arising from the reversal of existing taxable temporary differences; and</li> <li>The entity has suffered a loss in either the current or preceding period in the tax jurisdiction to which the deferred tax asset relates?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 12\r\n81 (j)', '21.2', 'If, as a result of a business combination, the parent entity has changed the amount recognized for its pre-acquisition deferred tax asset, has the amount of the change been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')
