timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>1</b>', '<b>Format and Presentation of the Balance Sheet</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.54 IAS 1.57', '1.1', '<b><u>As a minimum</u></b>, does the statement of financial position include line items that present: <ol type=\"a\"> <li>Property, plant and equipment;</li> <li>Investment property;</li> <li>Intangible assets;</li> <li>Financial assets (excluding amounts shown under e., h, and i);</li> <li>Investments accounted for using the equity method;</li> <li>Biological assets;</li> <li>Inventories;</li> <li>Trade and other receivables;</li> <li>Cash and cash equivalents;</li> <li>The total of assets classified as held for sale and assets included in disposal groups classified as held for resale in accordance with IFRS 5;</li> <li>Trade and other payables;</li> <li>Provisions;</li> <li>Financial liabilities (excluding amounts shown under k. and l.)</li> <li>Liabilities and assets for current tax;</li> <li>Deferred tax liabilities and assets;</li> <li>Liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5;</li> <li>Issued capital and reserves attributable to owners of the parent.</li> </ol> <p>NB1: The Standard does not prescribe either the format or the order in which these items are presented.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.55, 58,59', '1.2', 'Where necessary to give a true and fair view, have additional line items, headings and subtotals been included in the Statement of Financial Position?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.60 IAS 1.56 IAS 1.67', '1.3', '(Unless a liquidity based or ‘mixed’ basis presentation is more relevant) an entity shall present the following as separate elements of the Statement of Financial Positions: <ul> <li>Current Assets;</li> <li>Non-Current Assets;</li> <li>Current Liabilities; and</li> <li>Non-Current Liabilities.</li> </ul> <p>NB1: All deferred tax balance must be classified as non-current.</p> <p>NB2: Different terminology can be used for the above classifications.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.61 IAS 1.64.65', '1.4', 'Irrespective of how the Statement of Financial Position is presented, has the entity disclosed the amount expected to be recovered or settled after more than 12 months for each asset and liability line item that combines amounts expected to be recovered or settled: <ul> <li>No more than twelve months after the reporting period; and </li> <li>More than twelve months after the reporting period?</li> </ul> <p>Specific IFRS require extensive maturity disclosure regarding financial instruments (and thus there is some overlap in the requirements of the Standards), however, IAS 1.61 requires maturity analysis about all classifications, thus for example, provisions and stock would need the above analysis.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.77', '1.5', '<p>An entity shall disclose, either on the face of the Statement of Financial Position or in the notes a suitable sub-classification of the line items presented in the Statement of Financial Position (i.e. a split of receivables into: trade, related party, prepayment and other).</p>\r\n<p>IAS 1 gives examples only, and some specific Standards prescribe a minimum level of analysis (these issues have been specifically noted later in the checklist), however, management of the entity must consider whether the level of analysis is detailed enough to be meaningful.</p>\r\n<p>Has an adequate level of analysis been given for Statement of Financial Position items?</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>2</b>', '<b>Non-Current Assets classified as Held for Resale and the Assets of a Disposal Group</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 5.38', '2.1', 'Have non-current assets classified as held for sale and the assets of disposal groups classified as held for sale been disclosed separately?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 5.38', '2.2', 'Have the liabilities of disposal groups been disclosed separately within liabilities?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 5.38', '2.3', 'Have the major classes of assets or liabilities classified as held for sale been separately disclosed either in the Statement of Financial Position or the notes?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 5.41(a)', '2.4', 'Is there a description of the non-current assets (or disposal group)?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 5.41(b)', '2.5', 'Is there a description of the facts and circumstances of the sale, or leading to the expected disposal, and the expected manner and timing of that disposal?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 5.42', '2.6', 'Where a non-current asset (or disposal group) ceases to be treated as such have the following been disclosed:- <ul> <li>A description of the facts and circumstances leading to the decision; and </li> <li>The effect of the decision on the results of operations for the period and any prior periods presented?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>3</b>', '<b>Approval and Signature</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 10.17', '3.1', 'Is the date on which the financial statements are to be authorised for issue by the board of directors disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 10.17', '3.2', 'Where applicable has it been disclosed that under legislation, on a voluntary basis, the directors can amend these financial statements if they subsequently prove to be defective?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('Best Practice', '3.3', 'Are the names of the directors signing on behalf of the board stated?\r\n<p><i>If there is only one director, only one signature is needed.</i></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>4</b>', '<b>Intangible Assets (Including Goodwill)</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.119 IAS 38.125', '4.1', 'Are intangible assets suitably analysed, IAS 38 gives the following examples, which could be aggregated or disaggregated to make the information more meaningful: <ul> <li>Brand names;</li> <li>Mastheads and publishing titles;</li> <li>Computer software;</li> <li>Licences and franchises;</li> <li>Copyrights, patents and other industrial property rights, service and operating rights;</li> <li>Recipes, formulae, models, designs and prototypes; and</li> <li>Intangible assets under development?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('Voluntary Disclosure', '4.2', 'Entities are encouraged to disclose the following information by IAS 38.128: <ul> <li>A description of any fully amortised intangible assets that are still in use; and</li> <li>A brief description of significant intangible assets controlled by the entity but not recognised because they did not meet the recognition criteria in IAS 38 or because they were acquired or generated before the version of IAS 38 issued in 1998 was effective?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.124 (a)', '4.3', 'Where intangible fixed assets are revalued have the following disclosures been given by class of asset: <ul> <li>The effective date of the revaluation;</li> <li>The carry value of the intangible assets;</li> <li>The carrying value that would have been recognised had the assets been carried under the historic cost model?</li> </ul> <p>NB: It is illegal to revalue goodwill and other intangibles can rarely be revalued.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.118 (c), (e) ', '4.4', 'Is the following reconciliation note disclosed for each class of intangible fixed assets noted above and distinguishing between internally generated intangibles and other intangibles? <ul> <li>Aggregate cost / valuation at the beginning and end of the financial period;</li> <li>Additions, indicating separately those from internal development and those actually acquired;</li> <li>Acquisitions through businesses combinations;</li> <li>Assets now classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5;</li> <li>Other disposals;</li> <li>Increases and decreases in revaluation;</li> <li>Net exchange difference arising on the translation of the financial statement into the presentation currency, and on translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the entity;</li> <li>Other changes;</li> <li>Aggregate cumulative amortisation / impairment losses at the beginning and end of the period;</li> <li>Amortisation;</li> <li>Impairment losses recognised in the profit or loss;</li> <li>Impairment losses reversed in the profit or loss;</li> <li>Any adjustments as a result of disposals in the period;</li> <li>Assets now classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5; </li> <li>Other disposals;</li> <li>Net exchange differences arising on the translation of the financial statements into the presentation currency, and on translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the entity;</li> <li>Other changes;</li> <li>Net carrying amount at the beginning and end of the period?</li> </ul> <p>NB: Full corresponding amounts <b><u>need</u></b> to be disclosed.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.122 (b) ', '4.5', 'Where an <b><u>individual</u></b> intangible fixed asset is material, have the following been disclosed: <ul> <li>A description of the asset;</li> <li>The carrying value;</li> <li>The remaining amortisation period?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.122 (e) ', '4.6', 'Have any contractual commitments for the acquisition of intangible assets been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.122 (d)', '4.7', 'Where any intangible assets have restricted title or have been pledged as security for a liability, has this been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.122 (c )', '4.8', 'Where intangible assets have been acquired by way of a grant and have been recognised at fair value in accordance with IAS 38.44, have the following been disclosed: <ul> <li>The fair value initially recognised for these assets;</li> <li>The carrying value of these asset; and </li> <li>Whether they are measured after recognition under the cost model or the revaluation model?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.122 (a), IAS 38.123 ', '4.9', 'Where an intangible asset is deemed to have an indefinite useful economic life, have the following been disclosed:- <ul> <li>Its carrying value; and</li> <li>The reasons supporting the assessment of an indefinite useful life (IAS 38.90 gives examples)?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>5</b>', '<b>Property Plant and Equipment (PPE)</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.77(a) IAS 16.36 ', '5.1', 'Is PPE suitably classified? <p>The following examples are given in IAS 16:</p> <ul> <li>Land;</li> <li>Land and buildings;</li> <li>Machinery;</li> <li>Ships;</li> <li>Aircraft;</li> <li>Motor vehicles;</li> <li>Furniture and fixtures; and </li> <li>Office equipment.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.74 (a)', '5.2', 'Has the existence and carrying amounts of PPE to which the entity has restricted title, or that is pledged as security for a liability been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.74 (b)', '5.3', 'Has the amount of expenditure recognised in the carrying amount of an items of PPE in the course of construction been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.79', '5.4', 'Where useful to the user of the financial statements, have the following disclosures been given:- <ul> <li>The carrying amount of temporarily idle items of PPE;</li> <li>The gross carrying amount of any fully depreciated items of PPE that are still in use;</li> <li>The carrying value of items of PPE retired from active use and not classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5; and </li> <li>When the cost model is used, the fair value of PPE when this is materially different from the carrying amount?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.73 IAS 40.76(f)', '5.5', 'Is the following reconciliation note disclosed for each class of PPE: <ul> <li>Aggregate cost / valuation at the beginning and end of the financial period;</li> <li>Additions;</li> <li>Acquisitions through businesses combinations;</li> <li>Assets classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group as classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5 or other disposals;</li> <li>Foreign exchange movements;</li> <li>Revaluations;</li> <li>Other changes.</li> <li>Aggregate cumulative depreciation / impairment losses at the beginning and end of the period;</li> <li>Depreciation;</li> <li>Revaluations;</li> <li>Impairment losses recognised in profit or loss;</li> <li>Impairment losses reversed in profit or loss;</li> <li>Any adjustments as a result of assets being classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group as classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5 or other disposals;</li> <li>Foreign exchange movements;</li> <li>Other changes.</li> <li>Net carrying amount at the beginning and end of the period?</li> </ul> <p>NB1: Full corresponding amounts need to be disclosed.</p> <p>NB2: Transfers to and from investment properties will also need to be disclosed.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.77 (a) (b) (d) ', '5.6', 'Where items of PPE have been revalued, have the following disclosures been given in addition to the disclosures required by IFRS 13: <ul> <li>The effective date of the revaluation;</li> <li>Whether an independent valuer was involved;</li> <li>For each classification of PPE, the carrying value that would have been recognised if a cost model had been adopted?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>6</b>', '<b>Right of Use Assets and Assets Used in Operating Leases</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '6.1', 'IFRS 16 Leases disclosure requirements are collated into questions 13 to 16 below.', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>7</b>', '<b>Investment Properties</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS.40 75 (e) ', '7.1', '<p>Has the extent to which the fair value of investment properties is based on a valuation by an independent, qualified valuer, with recent experience in the location and class of asset been disclosed?</p>\r\n<p>Alternatively, where no such valuation has been undertaken has this fact been disclosed?</p>\r\n<p>NB: This disclosure would also apply where valuations are disclosed rather than accounted for.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.75 (g)', '7.2', 'Where there are restrictions on the realisability of investment properties or the remittance of income and proceeds of disposal has this been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.84C& 84E', '7.3', 'For accounting periods beginning <b><u>on or after 1 January 2018,</u></b> review paragraphs 57 and 58 of IAS 40 in relation to transfers of investment properties. These have been amended by <i>Transfers of Investment Property (Amendments to IAS 40).</i>\r\n<p>If, in accordance with paragraph 84C, an entity reclassifies property at the date of initial application of the Amendments, has the entity disclosed the amounts reclassified to, or from, investment property in accordance with paragraph 84C?</p>\r\n<i>The entity shall disclose those amounts reclassified as part of the reconciliation of the carrying amount of investment property at the beginning and end of the period as required by paragraphs 76 and 79.</i>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.76 IAS 40.78', '<b>7.4</b>', '<b>Investment Properties ~ Where the Fair Value Model has been Adopted</b> <p>Is the following information disclosed:</p> <ul> <li>Carrying value at the beginning and end of the financial period;</li> <li>Aggregate additions (showing separately additions arising from acquisitions, subsequent expenditure or as a result of a business combinations);</li> <li>Assets re-classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5 and other disposals;</li> <li>Net gains and losses from fair value adjustments;</li> <li>Net exchange differences;</li> <li>Transfers to and from inventories and owner-occupied properties (PPE); and</li> <li>Other changes?</li> </ul> <p>NB: Full corresponding amounts <b><u>need</u></b> to be disclosed.</p> <p>NB: Where in <b><u>exceptional circumstances</u></b> some assets are held at cost, then the above analysis would need to be given for assets held at fair value and assets held at cost.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.77', '7.5', 'Where a valuation obtained for an investment property is adjusted significantly before being incorporated into the financial statements (e.g. to avoid the double-counting of assets that are recognised as separate assets) is there a reconciliation between the two figures, showing separately the aggregated amount of any recognised lease obligations that have been added back?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.78 (a) to (d)', '7.6', 'In exceptional circumstances, where the entity has adopted the fair value model, however certain investment properties are carried at cost as their fair value cannot be established, have the following disclosures been given:- <ul> <li>A description of the investment property;</li> <li>An explanation of why fair value cannot be reliably measures;</li> <li>(If possible) The range of estimates within which fair value is highly likely to lie; and</li> <li>On disposal: <ul> <li>The fact that the entity has disposed of an investment property not carried at fair value;</li> <li>The carrying value at the time of sale; and</li> <li>The amount of gain or loss recognised?</li> </ul> </li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.80', '7.7', 'Where an entity capitalises a property interest held under an operating lease for the first time, then it is encouraged but not required to undertake a PYA <b><u>if the fair value of the property has been disclosed in the prior year financial statements</u></b> (this is a different treatment than that which is normally required by IAS 8), however, if in the above circumstances a PYA is not undertaken, has this fact been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.79 (c) to (d)', '7.8', '<b>Investment Properties ~ Where the Cost Model has been Adopted</b> <p>Is the following reconciliation disclosed:</p> <ul> <li>Aggregate cost at the beginning and end of the financial period;</li> <li>Aggregate additions (showing separately additions arising from acquisition, subsequent expenditure or as a result of a business combinations);</li> <li>Assets classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group as classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5 or other disposals;</li> <li>Transfers to and from inventories and owner-occupied properties (PPE);</li> <li>Foreign exchange movements;</li> <li>Other changes.</li> <li>Aggregate cumulative depreciation / impairment losses at the beginning and end of the period;</li> <li>Depreciation;</li> <li>Impairment losses recognised in the profit or loss;</li> <li>Impairment losses or reversed in the profit or loss;</li> <li>Any adjustments as a result of assets being classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group as classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5 or other disposals;</li> <li>Transfers to and from inventories and owner-occupied properties (PPE) due to change of usage;</li> <li>Foreign exchange movements;</li> <li>Other changes;</li> <li>Net carrying amount at the beginning and end of the period?</li> </ul> <p>NB: Full corresponding amounts <b><u>need</u></b> to be disclosed.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.79 (e) (i) to (iii) ', '7.9', 'Where it is not possible to <b><u>disclose</u></b> the fair of investment properties carried at cost, are the following disclosures given: <ul> <li>A description of the investment property;</li> <li>An explanation of why fair value cannot be reliably measures;</li> <li>(If possible) The range of estimates within which fair value is highly likely to lie?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>8</b>', '<b>Investments in Associates and Joint Ventures (Where Consolidated Financial Statements are Not Being Prepared)</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 27.17', '8.1', 'For each significant investment in a joint venture or associate are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>Name;</li> <li>The principal place of business (and country of incorporation, if different);</li> <li>The holding company’s proportion of the ownership interest (and its proportion of the voting rights, if different) held in those investees?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>9</b>', '<b>Inventories</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 2.36 (b) IAS 1.78 (c) IAS 2.37', '9.1', '<p>Has the total carrying value of inventories been disclosed, have inventories been appropriately classified and a carrying value disclosed for each classification?</p> <p>NB: The key issue is that the classification of inventories must be appropriate to the entity. IAS 2 notes that the following are common classifications:</p> <ul> <li>Merchandise;</li> <li>Product supplies;</li> <li>Materials;</li> <li>Work in progress; and</li> <li>Finished goods.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 2.36\r\n(c )', '9.2', 'Has the carrying value of inventories carried at fair value less cost to sell been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 2.36\r\n(h)\r\n', '9.3', 'Where stock has been pledged as security for liability, has the total carrying value of such items been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>10</b>', '<b>Receivables</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.78 (b)', '10.1', 'Are receivables analysed as follows: <ul> <li>Amounts receivable from trade customers;</li> <li>Receivable from related parties;</li> <li>Prepayments; and</li> <li>Other amounts?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS\r\n15.\r\n105', '10.2', 'When either party to a contract has performed, has the contract been presented in the statement of financial position as a contract asset or a contract liability, depending on the relationship between the entity’s performance and the customer’s payment? ', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 15. 105', '10.3', 'Has the entity disclosed any unconditional rights to consideration as a receivable? ', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 15. 109', '10.4', '<p>IFRS 15 uses the terms ‘contract asset’ and ‘contract liability’ but does not prohibit an entity from using alternative descriptions in the statement of financial position for those items. </p>\r\n<p>If an entity uses an alternative description for a contract asset, has sufficient information been provided for a user of the financial statements to distinguish between receivables and contract assets?</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11</b>', '<b>Deferred Tax Assets</b>\r\n<p>There are additional disclosures regarding deferred tax assets, however, to avoid duplication these have been in included in the ‘Provisions’ section of this checklist.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>12</b>', '<b>Cash and Cash Equivalents </b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('Best\r\nPractice', '12.1', 'Where client money has been derecognised, is the total amount disclosed, and has the accounting policy adopted by the entity been disclosed?', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '', '<b>IFRS 16 Leases</b> <p>IFRS 16 Leases is mandatory for accounting periods commencing on/after 1 January 2019. The disclosure requirements are more substantial than those previously required by IAS 17. </p> <p>The disclosures required under IFRS 16 have been listed below in this section, rather than split between the SCI, Statement of Financial Position and Accounting Policies sections of the Checklist. It is considered that, in the circumstances of the significant additional disclosures required, it is more straightforward to provide the disclosure requirements in one section.</p> <p>The disclosure requirements have been broken down as follows :</p> <ul> <li>13 – Entity is a lessee</li> <li>14 – Entity is lessor: finance leases</li> <li>15 – Entity is a lessor: operating leases</li> </ul> <p><b>First time adoption of IFRS 16 will also require additional transitional disclosures; see question 5.2 of Section 8 – </b>“Accounting Policies and Estimation Techniques” <b>below. This will require completion of a supplementary checklist.</b> </p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>13</b>', '<b>Entity is a Lessee</b>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.52', '13.1', 'A lessee shall disclose information about its leases for which it is a lessee in a single note or separate section in its financial statements. Has a separate note been presented which includes all of the appropriate information, including that detailed in the questions below? \r\n<p><i>NB: A lessee need not duplicate information that is already presented elsewhere in the financial statements, provided that the information is incorporated by cross-reference in the single note or separate section about leases.</i></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.53', '13.2', 'Has disclosure been given of the following amounts <b>relating to profit or loss and other comprehensive income</b>, in tabular format (unless another format is more appropriate): <ul> <li>depreciation charge for right-of-use assets by class of underlying asset (*);</li> <li>interest expense on lease liabilities;</li> <li>the expense relating to short-term leases where the recognition exemption (per paragraph 6 of IFRS 16) has been applied (NB: This expense need not include the expense relating to leases with a lease term of one month or less);</li> <li>the expense relating to leases of low-value assets where the recognition exemption (per paragraph 6 of IFRS 16) has been applied (NB: This expense shall not include the expense relating to short-term leases of low-value assets included in paragraph (c) above);</li> <li>the expense relating to variable lease payments not included in the measurement of lease liabilities;</li> <li>income from subleasing right-of-use assets (*); and</li> <li>gains or losses arising from sale and leaseback transactions?</li> </ul> <p><b>NB: if the right of use asset meets the definition of investment property, the disclosures marked (*) are not required to be given.</b></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.53', '13.3', 'Has disclosure been given of the following amounts <b>relating to the statement of cash flows</b>: <ul> <li>the total cash outflow for leases?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.53 IFRS 16.47 IFRS 16.48', '13.4', 'Has disclosure been given of the following amounts <b>relating to the statement of financial position</b>: <ul> <li>Additions to right of use assets (*);</li> <li>The carrying amount of right of use assets at the end of the reporting period, analysed by class of underlying asset (*); and</li> <li>If the right of use assets are not shown separately in the statement of financial position, disclosure of which line items in the statement of financial position include the right of use assets?</li> </ul> <p><b>NB: if the right of use assets meet the definition of investment property, these should be presented as investment property and the disclosure requirements of IAS 40 should be applied. The disclosures marked (*) above are not required to be given in this instance.</b></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.47', '13.5', 'Has disclosure been given of the following amounts <b>relating to the statement of financial position</b>: <ul> <li>The lease liabilities; and</li> <li>If the lease liabilities are not shown separately in the statement of financial position, disclosure of which line items in the statement of financial position include the lease liabilities?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.58', '13.6', '<p>Has the entity provided a maturity analysis of lease liabilities, disclosed separately from the maturity of other financial liabilities? </p>\r\n<p><b><i>NB: IFRS 16 does not mandate the time bands for the maturity analysis; instead, reference is made to IFRS 7 which suggests the entity uses judgement to determine an appropriate number of time bands.</i></b></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.60', '13.7', '<p>If the entity has taken advantage of the exemption to not apply the IFRS 16 recognition principles to short-term leases, has it disclosed that fact? </p>\r\n<p><b><i>NB: a short-term lease is a lease with a term of 12 months or less from the commencement date.</i></b></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.55', '13.8', 'If the portfolio of short-term leases to which the entity is committed at the end of the reporting period is dissimilar to the portfolio of short-term leases to which the current short-term-leases expense relates, is there disclosure of the lease commitments for short-term leases for which the exemption referred to above has been applied? ', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.60', '13.9', 'If the entity has taken advantage of the exemption to not apply the IFRS 16 recognition principles to leases of low-value assets, has it disclosed that fact?\r\n<p><b><i>NB: the “low value” criteria is an absolute criteria, based on the underlying asset having a value, when new, of US$5,000 or less. Materiality does not come into the equation.</i></b></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.59', '13.10', 'Where necessary to meet the objective of providing users of the financial statements with sufficient information to assess the effect that leases have on the financial position, financial performance and cash flows of the lessee, has additional qualitative and quantitative information been disclosed? <p>This may include the following: </p> <ul> <li>the nature of the lessee’s leasing activities;</li> <li>future cash outflows to which the lessee is potentially exposed that are not reflected in the measurement of lease liabilities. This includes exposure arising from: <ul> <li>variable lease payments;</li> <li>extension options and termination options;</li> <li>residual value guarantees; and</li> <li>leases not yet commenced to which the lessee is committed.</li> </ul> </li> <li>restrictions or covenants imposed by leases; and</li> <li>sale and leaseback transactions.</li> </ul> <p><b>Additional guidance is available in IFRS 16 B48 to B52</b></p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

In particular, a lessor shall disclose its risk management strategy for the rights it retains in underlying assets, including any means by which the lessor reduces that risk.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('SIC 29 6, 7', '18.1', 'All aspects of a service concession arrangement shall be considered in determining the appropriate disclosures in the notes. <p>An operator and a grantor shall disclose the following in each period: </p> <ul> <li>a description of the arrangement;</li> <li>significant terms of the arrangement that may affect the amount, timing and certainty of future cash flows (e.g. the period of the concession, re-pricing dates and the basis upon which re-pricing or re-negotiation is determined);</li> <li>the nature and extent (e.g. quantity, time period or amount as appropriate) of: <ul> <li>rights to use specified assets;</li> <li>obligations to provide, or rights to expect, provision of services;</li> <li>obligations to acquire or build items of property, plant and equipment;</li> <li>obligations to deliver or rights to receive specified assets at the end of the concession period;</li> <li>renewal and termination options; and</li> <li>other rights and obligations (e.g. major overhauls);</li> </ul> </li> <li>changes in the arrangement occurring during the period; and</li> <li>how the service arrangement has been classified?</li> </ul> <p>NB: These disclosures need to be provided individually for each service concession arrangement, or in aggregate for each class of service concession arrangements.</p>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.85 (a) to (e) ', '20.2', 'For each class of provision are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>The carrying amount at the beginning and end of the period;</li> <li>Additional provisions made in the period, including increases to existing provisions;</li> <li>Amounts used (i.e. incurred and charged against the provision) during the period;</li> <li>Unused amounts reversed during the period; and</li> <li>The increase during the period in the discounted amount arising from the passage of time and the effective change in the discount rate?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.85 (a) to (c) ', '20.3', 'Is the following disclosed for each class of provision: <ul> <li>A brief description of the nature of the obligation;</li> <li>The expected amount and timing of any resulting payments;</li> <li>An indication of uncertainties about the amount or timing of those outflows; </li> <li>(Where necessary to provide adequate information) the major assumptions made concerning future events; and</li> <li>The amount of any expected reimbursements, stating the amount of any asset that has been recognised for that expected reimbursement?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.92', '20.4', 'The disclosure requirements of 20.3 do not have to be complied with if deemed to be seriously prejudicial (unless required by statute, which some of them are): <p>If advantage is taken of this exemption, are the following disclosed:</p> <ul> <li>the general nature of the dispute; </li> <li>the fact that full disclosure has not been given, and</li> <li>the reason why the required information has not been given?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section6', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 15:26:38')

post.question:
<pre>Array
(
    [0] => <b>Format and Presentation of the Balance Sheet</b>
    [1] => <b><u>As a minimum</u></b>, does the statement of financial position include line items that present:
<ol type="a">
    <li>Property, plant and equipment;</li>
    <li>Investment property;</li>
    <li>Intangible assets;</li>
    <li>Financial assets (excluding amounts shown under e., h, and i);</li>
    <li>Investments accounted for using the equity method;</li>
    <li>Biological assets;</li>
    <li>Inventories;</li>
    <li>Trade and other receivables;</li>
    <li>Cash and cash equivalents;</li>
    <li>The total of assets classified as held for sale and assets included in disposal groups classified as held for resale in accordance with IFRS 5;</li>
    <li>Trade and other payables;</li>
    <li>Provisions;</li>
    <li>Financial liabilities (excluding amounts shown under k. and l.)</li>
    <li>Liabilities and assets for current tax;</li>
    <li>Deferred tax liabilities and assets;</li>
    <li>Liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5;</li>
    <li>Issued capital and reserves attributable to owners of the parent.</li>
</ol>
<p>NB1: The Standard does not prescribe either the format or the order in which these items are presented.</p>
    [2] => Where necessary to give a true and fair view, have additional line items, headings and subtotals been included in the Statement of Financial Position?
    [3] => (Unless a liquidity based or ‘mixed’ basis presentation is more relevant) an entity shall present the following as separate elements of the Statement of Financial Positions:
<ul>
    <li>Current Assets;</li>
    <li>Non-Current Assets;</li>
    <li>Current Liabilities; and</li>
    <li>Non-Current Liabilities.</li>
</ul>
<p>NB1:  All deferred tax balance must be classified as non-current.</p>
<p>NB2: Different terminology can be used for the above classifications.</p>
    [4] => Irrespective of how the Statement of Financial Position is presented, has the entity disclosed the amount expected to be recovered or settled after more than 12 months for each asset and liability line item that combines amounts expected to be recovered or settled:
<ul>
    <li>No more than twelve months after the reporting period; and </li>
    <li>More than twelve months after the reporting period?</li>
</ul>
<p>Specific IFRS require extensive maturity disclosure regarding financial instruments (and thus there is some overlap in the requirements of the Standards), however, IAS 1.61 requires maturity analysis about all classifications, thus for example, provisions and stock would need the above analysis.</p>
    [5] => <p>An entity shall disclose, either on the face of the Statement of Financial Position or in the notes a suitable sub-classification of the line items presented in the Statement of Financial Position (i.e. a split of receivables into: trade, related party, prepayment and other).</p>
<p>IAS 1 gives examples only, and some specific Standards prescribe a minimum level of analysis (these issues have been specifically noted later in the checklist), however, management of the entity must consider whether the level of analysis is detailed enough to be meaningful.</p>
<p>Has an adequate level of analysis been given for Statement of Financial Position items?</p>
    [6] => <b>Non-Current Assets classified as Held for Resale and the Assets of a Disposal Group</b>
    [7] => Have non-current assets classified as held for sale and the assets of disposal groups classified as held for sale been disclosed separately?
    [8] => Have the liabilities of disposal groups been disclosed separately within liabilities?
    [9] => Have the major classes of assets or liabilities classified as held for sale been separately disclosed either in the Statement of Financial Position or the notes?
    [10] => Is there a description of the non-current assets (or disposal group)?
    [11] => Is there a description of the facts and circumstances of the sale, or leading to the expected disposal, and the expected manner and timing of that disposal?
    [12] => Where a non-current asset (or disposal group) ceases to be treated as such have the following been disclosed:-
<ul>
    <li>A description of the facts and circumstances leading to the decision; and </li>
    <li>The effect of the decision on the results of operations for the period and any prior periods presented?</li>
</ul>
    [13] => <b>Approval and Signature</b>
    [14] => Is the date on which the financial statements are to be authorised for issue by the board of directors disclosed?
    [15] => Where applicable has it been disclosed that under legislation, on a voluntary basis, the directors can amend these financial statements if they subsequently prove to be defective?
    [16] => Are the names of the directors signing on behalf of the board stated?
<p><i>If there is only one director, only one signature is needed.</i></p>
    [17] => <b>Intangible Assets (Including Goodwill)</b>
    [18] => Are intangible assets suitably analysed, IAS 38 gives the following examples, which could be aggregated or disaggregated to make the information more meaningful:
<ul>
    <li>Brand names;</li>
    <li>Mastheads and publishing titles;</li>
    <li>Computer software;</li>
    <li>Licences and franchises;</li>
    <li>Copyrights, patents and other industrial property rights, service and operating rights;</li>
    <li>Recipes, formulae, models, designs and prototypes; and</li>
    <li>Intangible assets under development?</li>
</ul>
    [19] => Entities are encouraged to disclose the following information by IAS 38.128:
<ul>
    <li>A description of any fully amortised intangible assets that are still in use; and</li>
    <li>A brief description of significant intangible assets controlled by the entity but not recognised because they did not meet the recognition criteria in IAS 38 or because they were acquired or generated before the version of IAS 38 issued in 1998 was effective?</li>
</ul>
    [20] => Where intangible fixed assets are revalued have the following disclosures been given by class of asset:
<ul>
    <li>The effective date of the revaluation;</li>
    <li>The carry value of the intangible assets;</li>
    <li>The carrying value that would have been recognised had the assets been carried under the historic cost model?</li>
</ul>
<p>NB: It is illegal to revalue goodwill and other intangibles can rarely be revalued.</p>
    [21] => Is the following reconciliation note disclosed for each class of intangible fixed assets noted above and distinguishing between internally generated intangibles and other intangibles?
<ul>
    <li>Aggregate cost / valuation at the beginning and end of the financial period;</li>
    <li>Additions, indicating separately those from internal development and those actually acquired;</li>
    <li>Acquisitions through businesses combinations;</li>
    <li>Assets now classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5;</li>
    <li>Other disposals;</li>
    <li>Increases and decreases in revaluation;</li>
    <li>Net exchange difference arising on the translation of the financial statement into the presentation currency, and on translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the entity;</li>
    <li>Other changes;</li>
    <li>Aggregate cumulative amortisation / impairment losses at the beginning and end of  the period;</li>
    <li>Amortisation;</li>
    <li>Impairment losses recognised in the profit or loss;</li>
    <li>Impairment losses reversed in the profit or loss;</li>
    <li>Any adjustments as a result of disposals in the period;</li>
    <li>Assets now classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5; </li>
    <li>Other disposals;</li>
    <li>Net exchange differences arising on the translation of the financial statements into the presentation currency, and on translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the entity;</li>
    <li>Other changes;</li>
    <li>Net carrying amount at the beginning and end of the period?</li>
</ul>
<p>NB: Full corresponding amounts <b><u>need</u></b> to be disclosed.</p>
    [22] => Where an <b><u>individual</u></b> intangible fixed asset is material, have the following been disclosed:
<ul>
    <li>A description of the asset;</li>
    <li>The carrying value;</li>
    <li>The remaining amortisation period?</li>
</ul>
    [23] => Have any contractual commitments for the acquisition of intangible assets been disclosed?
    [24] => Where any intangible assets have restricted title or have been pledged as security for a liability, has this been disclosed?
    [25] => Where intangible assets have been acquired by way of a grant and have been recognised at fair value in accordance with IAS 38.44, have the following been disclosed:
<ul>
    <li>The fair value initially recognised for these assets;</li>
    <li>The carrying value of these asset; and </li>
    <li>Whether they are measured after recognition under the cost model or the revaluation model?</li>
</ul>
    [26] => Where an intangible asset is deemed to have an indefinite useful economic life, have the following been disclosed:-
<ul>
    <li>Its carrying value; and</li>
    <li>The reasons supporting the assessment of an indefinite useful life (IAS 38.90 gives examples)?</li>
</ul>
    [27] => <b>Property Plant and Equipment (PPE)</b>
    [28] => Is PPE suitably classified?
<p>The following examples are given in IAS 16:</p>
<ul>
    <li>Land;</li>
    <li>Land and buildings;</li>
    <li>Machinery;</li>
    <li>Ships;</li>
    <li>Aircraft;</li>
    <li>Motor vehicles;</li>
    <li>Furniture and fixtures; and </li>
    <li>Office equipment.</li>
</ul>
    [29] => Has the existence and carrying amounts of PPE to which the entity has restricted title, or that is pledged as security for a liability been disclosed?
    [30] => Has the amount of expenditure recognised in the carrying amount of an items of PPE in the course of construction been disclosed?
    [31] => Where useful to the user of the financial statements, have the following disclosures been given:-
<ul>
    <li>The carrying amount of temporarily idle items of PPE;</li>
    <li>The gross carrying amount of any fully depreciated items of PPE that are still in use;</li>
    <li>The carrying value of items of PPE retired from active use and not classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5; and </li>
    <li>When the cost model is used, the fair value of PPE when this is materially different from the carrying amount?</li>
</ul>
    [32] => Is the following reconciliation note disclosed for each class of PPE:
<ul>
    <li>Aggregate cost / valuation at the beginning and end of the financial period;</li>
    <li>Additions;</li>
    <li>Acquisitions through businesses combinations;</li>
    <li>Assets classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group as classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5 or other disposals;</li>
    <li>Foreign exchange movements;</li>
    <li>Revaluations;</li>
    <li>Other changes.</li>
    <li>Aggregate cumulative depreciation / impairment losses at the beginning and end of  the period;</li>
    <li>Depreciation;</li>
    <li>Revaluations;</li>
    <li>Impairment losses recognised in profit or loss;</li>
    <li>Impairment losses reversed in profit or loss;</li>
    <li>Any adjustments as a result of assets being classified as held for sale or included in a disposal group as classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5 or other disposals;</li>
    <li>Foreign exchange movements;</li>
    <li>Other changes.</li>

    [60] => <b>IFRS 16 Leases</b>
<p>IFRS 16 Leases is mandatory for accounting periods commencing on/after 1 January 2019. The disclosure requirements are more substantial than those previously required by IAS 17. </p>
<p>The disclosures required under IFRS 16 have been listed below in this section, rather than split between the SCI, Statement of Financial Position and Accounting Policies sections of the Checklist. It is considered that, in the circumstances of the significant additional disclosures required, it is more straightforward to provide the disclosure requirements in one section.</p>
<p>The disclosure requirements have been broken down as follows :</p>
<ul>
    <li>13 – Entity is a lessee</li>
    <li>14 – Entity is lessor: finance leases</li>
    <li>15 – Entity is a lessor: operating leases</li>
</ul>
<p><b>First time adoption of IFRS 16 will also require additional transitional disclosures; see question 5.2 of Section 8 – </b>“Accounting Policies and Estimation Techniques” <b>below. This will require completion of a supplementary checklist.</b> </p>
    [61] => <b>Entity is a Lessee</b>
    [62] => A lessee shall disclose information about its leases for which it is a lessee in a single note or separate section in its financial statements. Has a separate note been presented which includes all of the appropriate information, including that detailed in the questions below? 
<p><i>NB: A lessee need not duplicate information that is already presented elsewhere in the financial statements, provided that the information is incorporated by cross-reference in the single note or separate section about leases.</i></p>
    [63] => Has disclosure been given of the following amounts <b>relating to profit or loss and other comprehensive income</b>, in tabular format (unless another format is more appropriate):
<ul>
    <li>depreciation charge for right-of-use assets by class of underlying asset (*);</li>
    <li>interest expense on lease liabilities;</li>
    <li>the expense relating to short-term leases where the recognition exemption (per paragraph 6 of IFRS 16) has been applied (NB: This expense need not include the expense relating to leases with a lease term of one month or less);</li>
    <li>the expense relating to leases of low-value assets where the recognition exemption (per paragraph 6 of IFRS 16) has been applied (NB: This expense shall not include the expense relating to short-term leases of low-value assets included in paragraph (c) above);</li>
    <li>the expense relating to variable lease payments not included in the measurement of lease liabilities;</li>
    <li>income from subleasing right-of-use assets (*); and</li>
    <li>gains or losses arising from sale and leaseback transactions?</li>
</ul>
<p><b>NB: if the right of use asset meets the definition of investment property, the disclosures marked (*) are not required to be given.</b></p>
    [64] => Has disclosure been given of the following amounts <b>relating to the statement of cash flows</b>:

    <li>If the right of use assets are not shown separately in the statement of financial position, disclosure of which line items in the statement of financial position include the right of use assets?</li>
</ul>
<p><b>NB: if the right of use assets meet the definition of investment property, these should be presented as investment property and the disclosure requirements of IAS 40 should be applied. The disclosures marked (*) above are not required to be given in this instance.</b></p>

<p><b><i>NB: the “low value” criteria is an absolute criteria, based on the underlying asset having a value, when new, of US$5,000 or less. Materiality does not come into the equation.</i></b></p>
    [71] => Where necessary to meet the objective of providing users of the financial statements with sufficient information to assess the effect that leases have on the financial position, financial performance and cash flows of the lessee, has additional qualitative and quantitative information been disclosed? 
<p>This may include the following: </p>
<ul>
    <li>the nature of the lessee’s leasing activities;</li>
    <li>future cash outflows to which the lessee is potentially exposed that are not reflected in the measurement of lease liabilities. This includes exposure arising from:
        <ul>
            <li>variable lease payments;</li>
            <li>extension options and termination options;</li>
            <li>residual value guarantees; and</li>
            <li>leases not yet commenced to which the lessee is committed.</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
    <li>restrictions or covenants imposed by leases; and</li>
    <li>sale and leaseback transactions.</li>
</ul>
<p><b>Additional guidance is available in IFRS 16 B48 to B52</b></p>

    [86] => <b>Service Concession Arrangements</b>

    <li>the nature and extent (e.g. quantity, time period or amount as appropriate) of: 
        <ul>
            <li>rights to use specified assets;</li>
            <li>obligations to provide, or rights to expect, provision of services;</li>
            <li>obligations to acquire or build items of property, plant and equipment;</li>
            <li>obligations to deliver or rights to receive specified assets at the end of the concession period;</li>
            <li>renewal and termination options; and</li>
            <li>other rights and obligations (e.g. major overhauls);</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
    <li>changes in the arrangement occurring during the period; and</li>
    <li>how the service arrangement has been classified?</li>

<p>NB: These disclosures need to be provided individually for each service concession arrangement, or in aggregate for each class of service concession arrangements.</p>

    [106] => <b>Share Capital</b>
<p>It is necessary to understand the key terminology:</p>
<ul>
    <li>Authorised Share Capital = The maximum shares that a company can have;</li>
    <li>Issued Shares = The number of shares in existence;</li>
    <li>Allotted Shares = The number of shares allocated to shareholders;</li>
    <li>Called-Up Shares = Shares where payment has been requested;</li>
    <li>Paid-Up Shares = Payment has been received.</li>
</ul>
    [107] => Have the following been disclosed for each class of share capital:
<ul>
    <li>The number of authorised shares;</li>
    <li>The number of shares issued and fully paid;</li>
    <li>The number of shares issued and not fully paid;</li>
    <li>A reconciliation of the number of shares outstanding at the beginning and end of the reporting period;</li>
    <li>The rights, preferences and restrictions attaching to that class including: restrictions on the distribution of dividends and the repayment of capital; and</li>
    <li>Shares in the entity held by the entity or by its subsidiaries or associates; and share reserved for issue under options and contracts for sale of shares, including terms and amounts?</li>
</ul>
    [108] => If the entity has no share capital, has information equivalent to that noted in 23.1 been disclosed?  This must show changes during the period in each category of equity interest, and rights, preference and restriction attaching to each category of equity instrument.
    [109] => If an entity has reclassified:
<ul>
    <li>A puttable financial instrument classified as an equity instrument; or</li>
    <li>An instrument that imposes on the entity an obligation to deliver to another party a pro rata share of the net assets of the equity only on liquidation and is classified as an equity instrument;</li>
</ul>
<p>between financial liabilities and equity, has it been disclosed the amount reclassified into and out of each category, and the timing and reason for that reclassification?</p>
    [110] => If an entity has puttable financial instruments classified as equity, have the following disclosures been given (unless provided elsewhere):

    <li>The entity’s objectives, policies and processes for managing its obligations to repurchase or redeem the instrument when required to do so by the instrument holders, including any changes from previous period;</li>
    <li>The expected cash outflow on redemption or repurchase of that class of financial instrument; and</li>
    <li>Information about how the expected cash outflow on redemption or repurchase will be determined?</li>
</ul>
    [111] => <b>Financial Instruments</b>
<p>Disclosures relating to financial instruments affect receivables, payables, investments, bank and cash, and equity.  Rather than trying to lace these requirements into the specific Statement of Financial Position areas noted above and potentially having to repeat disclosures in this checklist on a number of occasions, the requirements of IFRS 7 <i>Financial Instruments: Disclosures</i> have been noted below.  </p>
<p>IFRS 9 <i>Financial Instruments</i> became mandatory for accounting periods commencing on/after 1 January 2018. Whilst IFRS 9 itself does not contain any disclosure requirements, it contains a number of changes to classification and measurement compared to IAS 39. </p>
<p>Reference should be made to Appendix B of IFRS 7 to assist with the disclosure requirements set out below.</p>
    [112] => <b>Classification of Financial Instruments</b>
    [113] => Does either the Statement of Financial Position or the notes disclose the carrying value of the following classifications of financial instruments:
<ul>
    <li>financial assets measured at fair value through profit or loss, showing separately:
        <ol type="i">
            <li>those designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently in accordance with paragraph 6.7.1 of IFRS 9; and </li>
            <li>those mandatorily measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9;</li>
        </ol>
    </li>
    <li>financial assets measured at amortised cost;</li>
    <li>financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income, showing separately:
        <ol type="i">
            <li>financial assets that are measured at fair value through other comprehensive income in accordance with paragraph 4.1.2A of IFRS 9; and</li>
            <li>investments in equity instruments designated as such upon initial recognition in accordance with paragraph 5.7.5 of IFRS 9;</li>
        </ol>
    </li>
    <li>financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, showing separately:
        <ol type="i">
            <li>those designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently in accordance with paragraph 6.7.1 of IFRS 9; and</li>
            <li>those that meet the definition of held for trading in IFRS 9.</li>
        </ol>
    </li>
    <li>financial liabilities measured at amortised cost?</li>
</ul>
    [114] => <b>Financial assets or financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss</b>
    [115] => If the entity has designated a financial asset (or group of financial assets) as measured at fair value through profit or loss that would otherwise be measured at fair value through other comprehensive income or amortised cost, have the following been disclosed:
<ul>
    <li>The maximum exposure to credit risk (see IFRS 7, paragraph 36 (a)) at the end of the reporting period;</li>
    <li>The amount by which any related credit derivatives or similar instruments mitigate that maximum exposure to credit risk;</li>
    <li>The amount of change, during the period and cumulatively, in the fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the financial asset determined either:
        <ul>
            <li>As the amount of change in its fair value that is not attributable to changes in market conditions that give rise to market risk; or</li>

    [144] => The disclosure requirements in IFRS 7 paragraphs 35F–35N shall be applied to financial instruments to which the impairment requirements in IFRS 9 are applied. 
<p>These disclosures shall enable users of financial statements to understand the effect of credit risk on the amount, timing and uncertainty of future cash flows. To achieve this objective, have the following disclosures been provided:</p>

    [145] => Has an explantion been given of the entity’s credit risk management practices and how they relate to the recognition and measurement of expected credit losses?

    [148] => To explain the changes in the loss allowance and the reasons for those changes, has a reconciliation from the opening balance to the closing balance of the loss allowance been given <b><u>for each class of financial instrument</u></b>?

    <li>the loss allowance measured at an amount equal to lifetime expected credit losses for:

<p><i>For loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts the loss allowance is recognised as a provision.     [149] => To enable users of financial statements to understand the changes in the loss allowance disclosed in accordance with paragraph 35H, has an explanation been provided of how significant changes in the gross carrying amount of financial instruments during the period contributed to changes in the loss allowance?

    [161] => <b>Transfers of Financial Assets</b>

    <li>When the counterparty (counterparties) to the associated liabilities has (have) recourse only to the transferred assets, a schedule that sets out the fair value of the transferred assets, the fair value of the associated liabilities and the net position;</li>
    <li>When the entity continues to recognise all of the transferred asset, the carrying amount of the transferred asset and the associated liability;</li>
    <li>When the entity continues to recognise the assets to the extent of its continuing involvement (see IAS 39,  paragraph 20 (c) (ii) and 30), the total carrying amount of the original assets before the transfer, the carrying amount of the assets that the entity continues to recognise, and the carrying amount of the associated liabilities?</li>
</ul>
    [164] => To meet the requirements of IFRS 7, paragraph 42B (b) above, have the following been disclosed:
<ol type="a">
    <li>The carrying amount of the assets and liabilities that are recognized in the entity’s Statement of Financial Position and represents the entity’s continuing involvement in the derecognised financial assets, and the line items in which the carrying amount of those assets and liabilities are recognised;</li>
    <li>The fair value of the assets and liabilities that represent the entity’s continuing involvement in the derecognised financial assets;</li>
    <li>The amount that best represents the entity’s maximum exposure to loss from its continuing involvement in the derecognised financial asset, and information showing how the maximum exposure to loss is determined;</li>
    <li>The undiscounted cash outflows that would or may be required to repurchase derecognised financial assets (e.g. the strike price in an option agreement) or other amounts payable to the transferee in respect of the transferred assets.  If the cash outflow is variable then the amount disclosed should be based on the conditions that exist at each reporting date;</li>
    <li>A maturity analysis of the undiscounted cash outflows that would or maybe required to repurchase the derecognised financial assets or other amounts payable to the transferee in respect of the transferred assets, showing the remaining contractual maturities of the entity’s continuing involvement; and</li>
    <li>Qualitative information that explains and supports the quantitative disclosures required by a to e above?</li>
</ol>
<p>The above information maybe aggregated in respect of particular assets if the entity has more than one type of continuing involvement in that derecognised financial asset, and reports it under one type of continuing involvement.</p>
    [165] => In addition to the disclosures required by IFRS 7, paragraph 42F, have the following disclosures been given:

        <ul>
